message: Let's split it 50/50, a fair start!
Take a small cut, let's move on!
I'll give you a quarter, but I want the majority
Middle ground, let's meet in the middle!
I'll give you a little more, but I'm still the majority
You're getting closer, but I'm still the majority
I'll give you a tiny bit, but I'm taking the majority
You're really close to losing everything, don't push it!
I'll give you a tiny fraction, but I'm almost there!
Last chance, take it or leave it!
I'll give you a tiny crumb, but I'm getting greedy!
I'll take it all, game over!
